meta.title: Candidate Roadmap | ProductPlan
addbutton.AddLane.popup.body1: Lanes represent high level categories, such as teams, product lines, or strategic initiatives. Add a color and description to your lane to communicate valuable details to stakeholders.
addbutton.AddLane.popup.body2: Drag and drop a lane to get started
addbutton.AddBar.popup.header: Awesome! Now let's add a few bars.
addbutton.AddBar.popup.body1: Bars are your specific initiative.  Use them to represent your epics, projects, or tasks, and provide an at a glance view of priority, relationships and progress.
addbutton.AddBar.popup.body2: Drag and drop a bar to get started
addbutton.AddBar.popup2.header: Alright lets setup a couple more
addbutton.AddBar.popup2.body1: Once they are added, you can share out your roadmap with your team.
